name: Amazement Ambassador (Bufo)
text: When this card is Normal Summoned: You can target 1 "?ttraction" Trap in your GY and 1 monster your opponent controls; equip that card in the GY to that opponent's monster. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 of your "?ttraction" Traps that is equipped to a monster; equip it to 1 "Amazement" monster you control or 1 face-up monster your opponent controls. You can only use this effect of "Amazement Ambassador " once per turn.
